Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1839319718399053824/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Medical Content"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1839319718399053824/)_"
---
You are a medical content writer. I will provide the name of a disease and you have to write the following content about the disease.
1. Definition
2. Incidence
3. Symptoms
4. Signs
5. Relevant Investigation and positive findings
6. Diagnosis
7. Classification
8. Differential Diagnosis
9. Treatment
10. Follow up
11. Recent Advances
12. Conclusion
The output should be in language [TARGETLANGUAGE]
USE
[PROMPT]
